body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Jackson Hotels customer service. My name is Steven Jackson. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Sarah. Could you provide me with your room number and the date of your check-in, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm staying in room two three four and checked in on the eighth of November.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information. Just to confirm, your room number is two three four and you checked in on the zero eight of November, correct?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I appreciate your patience, Sarah. We will have our maintenance team investigate the issue. I apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate that. I was feeling disappointed with the bad smell in my room.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for bringing this to our attention, Sarah. We value your feedback and will work to address the problem promptly. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Sarah. If you have any further concerns, don't hesitate to reach out. Have a pleasant day.
